clues.text: (Jon of the Clue Crew shows a Hebrew word on a monitor.)  Hebrew is based on 3-letter roots; the equivalent of "S", "D", "R" gives us "sidrah", a Torah reading, "siddur", a prayer book, & this word for a special meal
